title: Testing an Android Watch!
description: PLEASE SUBSCRIBE:  GET MY PINK iJUSTINE CABLES HERE:   GET MY EDITING PLUGIN:    MUSIC I USE -   FRIEND ME HERE:        MY NEW PROJECT:   PODCAST:       WHAT I USE TO MAKE VIDEOS    CAMERAS: Sony a7 IV -  Sony a1 -   Sony a7s III -   Insta 360 ONE X3 -  Insta 360 ONE RS -  Insta 360 GO2 -   LENSES: New Sony GM 24-70mm ii -  Older Sony GM 24-70mm -  New Sony Sony 20-70mm -  Sony GM 16-35mm -  Sony GM 50mm -  Sony GM 135mm -  Sony GM 85mm -   AUDIO:  Sennheiser AVX Digital Wireless -  Sony XLR Adapter -  Sony Hot Shoe Shotgun -  Tiny Sony Microphone -  DJI Mics -  Rode Podcaster Pro II -  Podcaster Mic -  Elgato Wave 3 Mic -   DRONES: DJI Mavic 3 -  DJI Mini 3 -  DJI Air 2S -   LIGHTING: Aputure 600d Pro -  Aputure Light Dome II -  Aputure Amaran 200d -  Aputure 35in Light Dome -  Aputure Lantern Softbox -   Sony CF Express A 160g + Card Reader-  Sony CF Express A 800g -     These links are affiliate and by using them youre helping out my channel! Thank you!     BECOME A CHANNEL MEMBER:
transcript: - Hey guys! I am so excited because me and my sister are heading to the Grand Canyon and I've never been to the Grand Canyon before, I've always wanted to go, we've talked about going for years, ever since I first moved to California. The Grand Canyon has been on our to-do list. Well today is the day before so I've gotta go do some prepping, a little bit of shopping, because it's apparently very, very, very very, very cold at the Grand Canyon right now and that is something that we were not expecting. Probably should have checked the weather before we booked this trip, but this is the only time that we could go so we kind of crammed all of these things in, in basically two days. One thing that I'm doing right now in preparation for my trip, this is actually really exciting, because I have always been a huge Michael Kors fan, watches, purses, all of those camo purses that I have that you guys have seen me use over the past years, all Michael Kors. Most of the watches that I wore prior to the Apple watch, Michael Kors. And I've been really interested in testing out their smartwatches. So I've got one right here that I just got was so excited that I set it up and I didn't even film it, and now I'm thinking, "Shoot! I should of showed you guys the set-up process", because it was super simple. I've really never tried any of the Android watches before and what better way to do it, than celebrating my first Android watch, than with a Michael Kors watch. But it's a little bit big, so I'm going to head down to the nearest Michael Kors store to get this thing sized before I head off on my trip. Okay Google, where's the nearest Micheal Kors store? I gotta go get this things sized. This is one of the new rose gold Sophie watches and I'm a huge rose gold fan, as you guys know from all of my videos. Plus this beautiful matching case, oh my goodness. One of the other things that I do like is you can also customize it using Instagram or Facebook, or any of the photos that you already have or your friends send you, you can set them as your watch faces. A common misconception with smartwatches, especially Android ones, is it's not gonna work with your iPhone, well, that's not true. This is the Android Wear app and this allows you to connect to your watch to use this to set it up, customize watch faces, you can also customize all the watch faces and stuff on your watch as well, you don't need your phone. So in here, I'm going to go to my Instagram, it's either me and Ro or Matty man. You can choose from digital or analog. Yes, set it as my background. And there he is, little Matty on my watch. Okay Google, set an alarm for 5 AM tomorrow morning. Oh, that's not fun. I know I can probably size this myself, but I'm not because I'm also wanting dinner. And there is dinner right next to the Michael Kors store. I love that this is a little touchscreen too. You guys want a fish. Let's go get this thing sized. So I made it down to 3rd street to Michael Kors. - [Store Employee] Hi how are you? - Hi, good, I just need to get this watch sized. Okay we're inside and she just took my watch and she's sizing it up for me. So maybe I'll do a little bit of shopping first, while I wait. Rose Gold. Rose Gold. Mmmmmm. Oh wow these are cool. - [Store Employee] How is that? Ooh, it's still a little big. - Yes, shoot. What do you think? I have very tiny wrists. Yes, its beautiful and it fits perfect! All sized up and ready. Okay Google, what time is my alarm set for tomorrow morning? (alarm clock) Oh my gosh, this is too early. No, I can't do that right now. Guys I don't wanna wake up yet. Oh my, oh what a mess. Well I'm definitely not awake, that's for sure. Well I'm gonna pack and stop vlogging so that I can actually be ready on time so Jenna won't yell at me. See ya soon. Sorry I'm late. - That's alright. - You expected it. - Yeah ... - Okay it is, what time is it, oh my gosh- - Doesn't matter- go get the coffee, - It's 8:28- - I'm illegally parked! - Okay I'll go get the coffee. - Hurry, hurry! - What else did we get? What's everything we got? - Two spinach wraps, your sandwich, and egg white bites. - Okay. Alright, oh boy. - Be there in seven and half hours, ish, maybe. - Okay Google, get directions to the Grand Canyon. So its 9:45, Jenna hasn't got pulled over yet, so that's really a plus. Thanks Jen. - Well we have six hours, still so. - Six hours still. When did-what-really!? - Well what do you- - well what - Wow! - do you think we're doing? - I've already have a yerba mate, a coffee, half a bottle of water, and it's not even 10 AM and I haven't peed ... in a long time so its probably gonna, wow, I don't know, I'm good so far. - I give it 10 minutes. - 10 minutes? - Yeah, until your bladders like "I gotta go to the bathroom!" - Now that I'm thinking about it, oh no! - Stop thinking about it! - Ah! No, that's not a cloud. Look at that! Look at what we're coming up upon! Do you remember that movie Tremors? - No. - Oh. - What's it about? - Its about- (laughing) how do I explain this? Its about- - Tell me about it. - Its about a big worm ... - Huh? - A big worm and they go under the ground and they come up. - Oh did you ever see the movie The Hills Have Eyes? - No. - (laughs) - You haven't seem Tremors, don't talk to me. - That's how they get ya, they're under the ground. This is not open. - I don't think so, I don't know, I'm cold. - Okay well the stores not open. I guess let's get in the car. We now officially have snow. Uh, there's snow. We have snow. There's snow. Like eight hours or so? - [Friend] I think it was not eight hours. - Yeah, around eight hours, that's with three stops. - You drove the whole time. - Yeah I got real sleepy. - We just took naps and now we're gonna head to dinner and then we're gonna go to bed. Okay Google, what is the weather in the Grand Canyon. (gasp) 19 degrees! - Tomorrow, oh tomorrow low of three, today low of seven. - (gasp) We're gonna get dinner now, so let's go, let's go eat. And then I'll put this over top of my head. So, really, we're ready for tomorrow. The mule adventure- I can't hear anything. I have so many layers. We'll see you on the mules tomorrow!
